data.title: Company Profile of Microsoft
data.meta_description: Company Profile of Microsoft - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Microsoft is a multinational technology company founded in 1975. It develops and sells operating systems, servers, business and consumer software, and provides related services. Microsoft's products include the Windows operating system, Office productivity suite, and Dynamics business solutions. The company generates over $60 billion in annual revenue and employs nearly 90,000 people worldwide. Microsoft aims to continue innovating through research and development to enhance productivity and meet customer needs across all business segments.
